Question: This discussion group was founded around this person at the suggestion of the physician Wilhelm Stekel.
Hints: Some French feminists, among them Julia Kristeva and Luce Irigaray, have been influenced by this person as interpreted by Lacan.
This person began smoking tobacco at age 24; initially a cigarette smoker, he became a cigar smoker.
This person's early followers met together formally for the first time at the Hotel Bristol, Salzburg on 27 April 1908.
